plot: It is 1906. Young Ruut lives with her father and takes care of her ill grandmother. A letter from congregation takes her to a mission evening, which brings her to think over her plans and question her grandmother's authority.
title: Kutsumus
plot_es: It is 1906. Young Ruut lives with her father and takes care of her ill grandmother. A letter from congregation takes her to a mission evening, which brings her to think over her plans and question her grandmother's authority.
